name: NutritionEducationEncountersHCPCS
title: Nutrition Education Encounters HCPCS
purpose: (Clinical Focus: These encounter codes represent education by a food and nutrition professional.),(Data Element Scope: Codes included represent nutrition education provided for individual or groups by a food and nutrition professional.),(Inclusion Criteria: Data elements represent specific education provided by a food and nutrition professional.),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)
